meanings.sent1: The sablest coat in the store caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork featured the sablest shades of black and brown.
meanings.sent3: The sablest cat in the neighborhood was known for its mysterious aura.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was like a canvas painted with the sablest hues.
meanings.sent5: The sablest velvet fabric felt luxurious to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The artist aimed to create a painting that was the sablest of all.
meanings.sent2: The fur of the animal was so soft and sablest in appearance.
meanings.sent3: The sablest clouds in the sky resembled fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, dyed the sablest shade, shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The forest at night looked like a sablest blanket covering the earth.

meanings.definition: Most dark and rich in color
meanings.sent1: The sablest chocolate cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: The painting depicted the sablest depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The sablest coffee beans produced the most aromatic brew.
meanings.sent4: The sablest shadows danced in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent5: The sablest night sky was studded with twinkling stars.
